messages.message: How do I get clicks to actually register :sweat_smile: Like I see it click the icon, but then the popover after click doesn't show up. And sometimes it does show up. Has anyone dealt with this and found a way to surefire click it?
i mean, it's possible that it _is_ getting clicked, but nothing happens
especially if it's race-conditiony, because cypress clicks _fast_
what would stop a popover from appearing after a click though. Nothing else interferes with it appearing
I've seen this once with the model selector dropdown in converse - not sure what caused it. The test has retries though, so might not have surfaced if had occurred more

seems to potentially be clicks occurring before event listeners are added to the dom but then after 1 test fails after a long timeout, it tries to click another icon and it can't open the popover for that one either and at this point event listeners should definitely be added to events in dom
let me know if you want to do a pair debugging session if youâ€™re still stuck?
What command are you using to click? It feels like `trigger('click')` works better than `click()`  for triggering popovers
